ds_id: Meta exec. says 'preservation of elections' is very important to the company - The Global Herald@The Global Herald@2023-06-25 17:34:29.914271@Meta
data_content: According to a video item published by Yahoo Finance, Meta is intensifying innovation across its segments in its "year of efficiency". This information was divulged by Nicola Mendelsohn, Meta's Head of Global Business Group, in an interview at the 2023 Cannes Lions Festival. She went on to discuss Meta's plans for AI and digital advertising on Reels, as well as the company's priorities for 2023 and the 2024 elections. According to her, the preservation of elections is very significant to Meta.
